job_description:
• The engineer will support the mechanical and thermal engineering team for the overall mechanical solution, creation of specifications, design review and qualification, and testing and validation.
• #getreadytogrow Are currently enrolled and studying towards a Mechanical Engineer Degree (Bachelors, Masters or PHD students welcome).
• Candidates with alternative degrees will also be considered if they have relevant experience.
• Adaptability and willing to learn how to use unfamiliar tools and systems Experience using 3D CAD software (Creo preferred, not required) Good interpersonal skills with an analytical approach.
• Experienced Professionals Curiosity about technology outside of the classroom – personal projects, mechanical design, building projects or internships etc.
• This position is a intern mechanical engineer role.
• The mechanical engineer will work in a project team delivering complex AI data center hardware.
• The primary responsibility is to ensure the overall product functionality and meet all applicable technical mechanical specifications.
